mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user LEFT OUTER JOIN sns_user ON user.id = sns_user.user_id WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT user_id FROM sns_user WHERE sns_id = #{snsId} AND client_name = #{clientName}) `User_id` INNER JOIN `user` ON `user`.id = `User_id`.user_id INNER JOIN `sns_user` ON `sns_user`.user_id = `User_id`.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (order_id, user_id, imp_uid, merchant_uid, order_name, order_price, buyer_name, buyer_addr, buyer_tel, order_request) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{impUid}, #{merchantUid}, #{orderName}, #{orderPrice}, #{buyerName}, #{buyerAddr}, #{buyerTel}, #{orderRequest})
INSERT INTO order_detail (order_detail_id, order_id, product_id, quantity, product_price) VALUES (#{orderDetailId}, #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{productPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, od.order_detail_id, od.product_id, od.product_price, od.quantity, p.name as product_name, p.image_data as product_image, IF(rf.refund_id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) as is_refunded FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON o.order_id = od.order_id LEFT JOIN product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN refunds rf ON od.order_detail_id = rf.order_detail_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND o.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT od.*, od.order_detail_id as orderDetailId, p.image_data as productImage, p.name as productName FROM order_detail od INNER JOIN product p on od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE od.order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT * FROM order_detail o INNER JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, password, name, postcode, road_address, detail_address, tel, email, nickname) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{postcode}, #{roadAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{nickname})
INSERT INTO sns_user(user_id, sns_id, client_name) VALUES (#{userId}, #{snsId}, #{clientName})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{realName}, postcode = #{postcode}, road_address = #{roadAddress}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname} WHERE id = #{id} ### 비밀번호 업데이트는 별도로 해주고 있다

UPDATE user u JOIN user_defaults d ON u.id = d.id SET u.password = d.password, u.name = d.name, u.postcode = d.postcode, u.road_address = d.road_address, u.detail_address = d.detail_address, u.tel = d.tel, u.email = d.email, u.nickname = d.nickname WHERE u.id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE od FROM order_detail od JOIN orders o ON od.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId}
DELETE r FROM refunds r JOIN order_detail od ON r.order_detail_id = od.order_detail_id JOIN orders o ON od.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId}
